fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Environment, Research and innovation, Food Safety
eu_initiatives: bio-ferm plans/prepares to participates in the stakeholders consultation of the REFIT procedure to assess the functioning of the PPP regulations (EC) No 1107/2009 [on placing on the market) and (EC) No 396/2005 [on residue limits] which was initiated European Commission in autumn 2016.
organisation_name: bio-ferm Biotechnologische Entwicklung und Produktion GmbH
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
bio-ferm is working on the international product registration and marketing of innovative biotechnological plant protection products in viticultur, pome fruit, berries and tomatos.  
 
The company bio-ferm is part of ERBER Group, an Austrian biotech company with headquarter in Getzersdorf (Lower Austria).
